document_data.name: Volo's Guide to All Things Magical
document_data.author: [[Volothamp Geddarm]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Volo's Guide to All Things Magical''''' was a pamphlet written by [[Volothamp Geddarm]] early in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Description: Printed on vellum, and a grab-bag full of odds and ends about [[magic]].
document_data.Controversy: Several powerful mages, including [[Elminster]], All copies were hunted down and destroyed.

History.Re-Release: In the {{YearlinkName|1367}}, a second pamphlet of the same name was released.{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}
